"Shopping in Tokyo":
"There's something I need to go to Tokyo
to buy.
But it's really hard to get...
And I'm not sure how well I'll be able to
fight with this body.
Could you take me on a mission to
Tokyo?

※Clear on Normal or higher accompanied
only by Hitsugi (Summer)"

"Hitsugi (Summer)'s PC
※Given upon acceptance.
※No presents given for boosting friendship."
